descriptionHtml:
ArchMage Robes v2.0
--------------

This is a compilation of some of the retextures I\'ve done to the ArchMage robes.

There are 4 male version and 2 female versions. All have matching hoods.

MALE
----

Mbluelight - Blue knotwork, white fur, gold trim
Mbluedark  - Blue knotwork, dark fur, dark trim
Mredlight  - Red knotwork, white fur, gold trim
Mreddark   - Red knotwork, dark fur, dark trim

FEMALE
------

Fblue - Blue knotwork
Fred  - Red knotwork

I do plan on adding more female versions in the future. Time and interest shown in the comments will determine when.

INSTALL
-------

In the archive is 6 zips. Simply unzip which ever version you would like to use to your main Skyrim directory.

NOTES
-----

I have not included the female normal maps (the _n files) I did not make enough changes to warrant needing a new map.

I have a few other male variants about the nexus, just search for vjludovico.

Feel free to redistribute with credit.

COMING SOON in v3
-----------------

New fabric patterns and leather bordering.
Reworked hoods.
Better specular maps.

Enjoy

 - Ludovico
author: Ludovico
